name: Defensive
content:
Description

A defensive weapon grants advantage equal to the listed value when its wielder takes the defend action. Additionally, you gain a +1 armor bonus when wielding a defensive weapon (regardless of the defensive value listed). While wielding an item with the *defensive* property, you don't gain the advantage 1 to attacks normally associated with Melee One-handed or Two-handed weapons. A weapon cannot have a defensive value greater than 3.
